mapper.sql: id, `date`, facebook_id, adset_id, gmv, spend, budget, impressions, frequency, reachs, clicks, purchases, cost_general, cost_purchasing, update_time
mapper.select:
select
distinct
'true' as QUERYID,
from report_hourly
order by ${orderByClause}
